# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(BusRouteQuery LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "/usr/local/bin/gcc")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "/usr/local/bin/g++")
add_executable(BusRouteQuery "")
set_target_properties(BusRouteQuery PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "BusRouteQuery")
set_target_properties(BusRouteQuery PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
target_compile_options(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fconcepts-diagnostics-depth=4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fconcepts-diagnostics-depth=4>
)
set_target_properties(BusRouteQuery PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET BusRouteQuery PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(BusRouteQuery PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
